article_title: Bill Would Directly Affect Access to Healthcare in Richland County

article_metadata.description: Dear fellow constituents, I am writing to apprise you of a bill that has been introduced in the Illinois House of Representatives which would directly affect access to healthcare in Richland County— House Bill 421. By voting yes, Illinois lawmakers can provide their constituents with full and direct access to advanced practice nurses (APNs), bringing to the state a health care delivery model that has been proven safe and effective in 19 states.  The bill allows patients to
